stepTitle: A piece of zinc at $$20.0$$ °C that weighs $$60.0$$ g is dropped into $$200.0$$ g water at $$100.0$$ °C. The specific heat capacity of zinc is $$0.389$$ J /(g. °C), and that of water near 100°C is J /(g. °C).
stepBody: Calculate the final temperature (in °C) reached by the zinc and the water.
